text: The men's 4 x 400 metres relay event at the 2003 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Bydgoszcz, Poland, at Zawisza Stadion on 20 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Rafał Wieruszewski Kacper Skalski Daniel Dąbrowski Marek Plawgo ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Sebastian Gatzka Christian Duma Steffen Sattelmaier Bastian Swillims ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Roman Matveyev Dmitriy Petrov Aleksandr Borshchenko Amdrey Polukeyev ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !! title: 2003 European Athletics U23 Championships – Men's 4 × 400 metres relay
